task.en: In the current view, the logo and the texts are horizontally separate apart. How to make them together, removing the room between them?

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Xcode" to close windows' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/BenchmarkApp && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/BenchmarkApp /Users/ec2-user/Documents && cd /Users/ec2-user/Documents/BenchmarkApp && git checkout a68605b && open -a Xcode /Users/ec2-user/Documents/BenchmarkApp
grading_command: cat /Users/ec2-user/Documents/BenchmarkApp/BenchmarkApp/ContentView.swift | sed -e 's|//.*||' -e 's|/\*[^*]*\*+\([^/]*\*/\)| |g' -e 's|/\*.*||' -e 's|.*\*/||' | tr -d '\n' | tr -d ' ' | grep -q 'Image(systemName:"globe").imageScale(.large).foregroundStyle(.tint)Text("Hello,world!")' && echo "True" || echo "False"
